i am an army ranger.

content.text: What are your thoughts on dragons?
Me too! I love the idea of a giant, fire-breathing lizard.
I love their mythology and stories. They're so powerful and mysterious.
I know, right? They're like the ultimate mythical creature.
I'm glad to see that someone else loves dragons as much as I do!
Me too! I wish they were real.
Me too! I would love to ride a dragon.
That would be amazing! I would fly all over the world on a dragon.
Me too! We would explore all sorts of amazing places.
It would be a dream come true.
